testCases.description: should successfully connect to the database
should register a new user with valid data
registration not allowed with missing name (name is required)
registration not allowed with invalid name (length of name should be greater than equal to 3)
registration not allowed with invalid email)
registration not allowed with missing email (email is required))
registration not allowed with missing age (age is required))
registration not allowed with inavalid age (age should be greater than 0))
registration not allowed without type (type is required)
registration not allowed with inavalid type (can be either 'student,' 'fresher,' or 'experienced'))
should log in a user with valid credentials
should handle login with invalid credentials
user should not be able to login with old password after updating the password
